knimeNode.name: Boosting Learner Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loop end node for learning an ensemble model with boosting

fullDescription.intro: Together with the corresponding loop start node a boosting loop can be constructed. It repeatedly trains simple models and weights them according to their classification error. The algorithm used is AdaBoost.M1. The loop is stopped either after the maximum number of iterations has been reached or the prediction error for a model is greater than 0.5.
fullDescription.option: The column from the first input table that contains the learned model
The column from the second input table that contains the real class values for each row
The column from the second input table that contains the predicted class values for each row
The number of iterations the loop should be run i.e. the number of models to be learned

ports.inPort: The trained model converted into a single-row, single-column table
The data with predicted classes and also the real class values
ports.outPort: The boosted model together with their weights in data table
